works.title: YXN
works.description: Sound and video work featuring film of cows in heat (yxna) and chewing the cud in a field with text overlay. The word YXN may not exist but is used here as a noun, while yxna is an adjective. Shown on a large screen with a poem read by Magnús Pálsson heard through 4 hanging headphones. About a young boy in the country and his dealings with people, cows and horses. Filmed by Steinþór Birgisson near Selfoss with Ingólfsfjall in the background.
